title: 🌟 Memorial Day Announcement 🌟 5/26/2025
description:
🌟 **Memorial Day Announcement** 🌟

Hi Creators,

In honor of Memorial Day, our team will be taking the day off this coming Monday. 🇺🇸 It's a time to remember and honor those who have bravely served our country.

Feel free to continue going LIVE, but please note that both the Infinitum and TikTok Teams will be offline for the day. If you have any urgent questions or need support, please reach out before the holiday, and we'll make sure you're taken care of.

Enjoy your long weekend, and thank you for being a valued part of the Infinitum LIVE Creator Network! ✨

Best, 
Infinitum LIVE Creator Network

title: 📣 Infinitum Policy Update: Box Battles & Guest Boxes
description:
📢 **Official PSA — Policy on Box Battles & Guest Box Participation**

Effective immediately, Infinitum LIVE Creator Network will **not** join or moderate any battle-box or box-battle events hosted by accounts outside our network. Additionally, Infinitum will no longer schedule or promote battle-box sessions of our own.

**Why this change matters**
1. **Earnings Impact** – Battle-box revenue now diverts a larger share to the host, so you earn **significantly less** than in standard 1-to-1 battles or solo LIVE sessions.
2. **Monthly LIVE-Time Compliance** – Minutes spent as a *guest* in someone else’s box **do not count** toward Infinitum’s required monthly LIVE-time thresholds. Only hours streamed from your own host window are credited.
3. **Algorithmic Performance** – Appearing in boxes—especially when cameras are switched off—lowers viewer retention and **suppresses your reach on the For You Page**.
4. **Brand & Viewer Experience** – Camera-off boxes hurt professionalism and viewer trust.

**Infinitum’s stance**
• We **do not encourage** participation in box battles under current payout and visibility conditions.
• We **will not** enter external battles to push scores, gifts, or rankings.
• We **will continue** supporting your growth through coaching, strategic 1-to-1 battles, goal tracking, and high-value LIVE formats that maximize diamonds and audience retention.

**Your next steps**
• Focus on **solo or 1-to-1 battles** hosted from your own account.
• Maintain **camera-on, high-quality streams** to drive algorithmic favorability.
• Track your hours in InfiniVIEW to ensure they count toward monthly targets.
• Direct questions to your Creator Network Manager or open a ticket in the “LIVE Support” Discord channel.

title: Infinitum LIVE TikTok Raid Chain Is LIVE! 🔁
description:
Hey Creators —

Big news. We’re launching something game-changing for our TikTok LIVE family... 🎥🔥

Introducing the Infinitum LIVE TikTok Raid Chain – a community-powered, momentum-building experience where we pass viewers from one creator to the next—just like Twitch raids, but made for us and made for TikTok.

🚀 What’s a TikTok Raid?
It’s simple:
We go live back-to-back, each for 1 hour and 1 minute, and at the end of each session, you shout out the next creator and send your viewers their way.

This means:
• More eyes on your content
• More chances to go viral together
• And a tighter, more powerful creator network ✊

🧠 How It Works:
1. You sign up for a time slot (link below).
2. You go live on TikTok at your scheduled time.
3. At the 60-minute mark:
   • Shout out the next creator
   • Pin their @handle or LIVE link in your chat
   • Encourage your viewers to “RAID” over to their stream
   • End your stream at 1 hour and 1 minute.

That’s it. Your job is done, and the next creator keeps the fire going 🔥

📅 Why Join the Raid Chain?
• Grow your LIVE audience naturally
• Get discovered by other creators’ communities
• Be part of a daily content wave that TikTok’s algorithm loves
• Support each other and show the world what creator collaboration really looks like

✅ What You Need to Do Now:
📥 Sign up here: https://forms.gle/n57LtAEJnXwbbYtv5
🧭 Make sure your TikTok profile is set up for LIVE (must meet platform requirements)
📢 Be ready to go live, support your fellow creators, and have fun with it!

💡 Pro Tip:
Want to stand out? Use your stream to hype up the next creator with energy, vibes, or a mini countdown before your handoff. Show the viewers it’s all connected 💫

Let’s raid. Let’s grow. Let’s GO.

#InfinitumLIVE #TikTokRaidChain #CreatorFamily #SupportCreators

title: Important Reminder to All Infinitum LIVE Creators 📣
description:
Dear Creators,

We want to take a moment to thank you for your continued trust and dedication as a member of the Infinitum LIVE Creator Network. Our community thrives because of your commitment, creativity, and loyalty — and we are proud to support you every step of the way.

However, it has come to our attention that some creators have been contacted by outside networks or individuals attempting to poach or lure creators away from our community. Please understand:

🔒 This is a direct violation of both TikTok LIVE policy and your agreement with Infinitum LIVE Creator Network.

❗ Entertaining offers, conversations, or invitations from other networks while contracted with Infinitum is strictly prohibited. These actions are not only a breach of contract, but they can result in serious consequences for both the creator and the violating network.

🚫 If You Leave Due to Poaching:
The violating agency will be reported to TikTok.
That agency will receive violation points, which may lead to the termination of their agency status with TikTok.
Infinitum will pursue legal action against any individual or entity who violates our agreements or attempts to disrupt the integrity of our network.

🚫 If a Creator in Our Network Starts Their Own Agency:
This is a breach of contract and will result in termination from Infinitum LIVE.
It will also trigger legal enforcement actions, including possible claims for damages, as outlined in the agreement you signed.

We do not take these matters lightly. Our contracts are legally binding, enforceable, and designed to protect the time, effort, and trust we all put into this network.

🤝 Need Help or Have Questions?
If you're ever unsure, uncomfortable, or just need support — please reach out to your assigned manager or email us directly at support@infinitumlive.com. We are here for you. Always.

Thank you again for being a valued part of the Infinitum family. Together, we grow stronger. 💎

— Infinitum LIVE Creator Network
Owned and operated by creators, for creators.

title: EOM March 2025 Infinitum Creator Campaign 🚀
description:
Overview
From March 25 to April 1, Infinitum is rallying its creators to earn the highest possible Diamond totals. If our network lands in the Top 3 overall ranking, the Top 20 Infinitum creators with diamonds, valid days, and hours will receive incredible rewards. Every Diamond counts, so keep streaming and shining! 💎

MIN to be rewarded:
• 1,000 Diamonds
• 10 valid days
• 20 valid hours (FOR THE ENTIRE MONTH)

Rewards

1st Place: TikTok Universe 🌌 + TikTok Swag 🎉 + Infinitum Swag 💎

2nd Place: Lion 🦁 + TikTok Swag 🎉 + Infinitum Swag 💎

3rd Place: Interstellar 🚀 + TikTok Swag 🎉 + Infinitum Swag 💎

4th–7th: Meteor Shower ☄️

8th–9th: Travel in the US 🇺🇸

10th: Galaxy 🌠

11th–20th: I Love TikTok LIVE 💗

How to Win
• Go live frequently 🎥 and encourage your audience to send gifts 🎁.
• Keep your content fresh 🎨 and engaging to maximize Diamond collection 💎.
• Stay compliant with TikTok’s guidelines—avoid any penalties 🚫 that might reduce your Diamond totals.

Make It to the Top
Every regular Diamond is worth 1 point, and every match Diamond is worth 2 points. We’re competing hard to secure a Top 3 spot 💯 and claim those rewards for our leading creators.

Get Ready
• Promote Your Streams: Announce your times 🎙️ and hype up your audience.
• Collaborate: Cross-promote with fellow Infinitum creators 🤝 to boost visibility.
• Track Progress: Compare notes and encourage each other to push forward 🔥.

Good luck, Infinitum creators—let’s dominate the leaderboard together!

Current Leaderboard (manually updated):

title: Apply as Mentor to prove yourself to become a manager!
description:
Mentor Qualification Checklist – Path to Becoming a Manager

Trial Period: 1 Month (3 Month Maximum time to complete) (Compensation: $20 per creator who meets the requirements)

To successfully transition from a mentor to a manager, you must complete the following:

Recruitment: Enroll a minimum of 20 new creators into the network. [Apply here](https://infinitumlive.com/creator-pre-check/)

Performance Goals: At least 3 out of the 20 recruited creators must achieve:
• 10 valid days
• 20 hours of live streaming
• 100,000 diamonds

Creator Development: Actively collaborate with your recruits to identify areas for growth and provide strategic guidance to help them improve their performance on LIVE.

Support & Resources: Ensure creators receive the necessary support by providing them with relevant documents, guides, and materials from our Discord community.

Mentor Requirement: Must complete 7 valid days and 15 hours a month on their own personal account each month.

### Transition to Manager Role

Once you successfully transition to a manager, you will be sent the Official Creator Agreement and the Manager Pay Policy, outlining your responsibilities, compensation, and additional benefits as a manager.

[Apply here](https://forms.gle/kqkr3jrRkZZbrBnU6):

title: TikTok LIVE - Understanding 1099-K Tax Forms
description: The Internal Revenue Service (IRS) requires US payment processors, including TikTok Inc., to file and send you a 1099-K if the payment processor has transferred more than $20000 and 200 transactions to you during the year. Otherwise check your paypal for Tax forms.

title: HIGH-END RECRUITING BONUS (FEB-MARCH 2025)
description:
**MARK: Documentation Overview**

- **Active Recruit:** Indicates whether the recruiter status is active (YES or NO).
- **Tier:** Designates the level or rank (e.g., Rookie).
- **Valid Days:** Total number of days that the current status remains valid (e.g., 7).
- **Hours:** Represents allotted or tracked hours during the valid period (e.g., 15).
- **Diamonds REQ:** Specifies the required diamonds or points (e.g., 20,000).
- **Pay:** Denotes the monetary payout for this tier and status (e.g., $10).

**Sample Entry:**
- Active Recruit: YES
- Tier: Rookie
- Valid Days: 7
- Hours: 15
- Diamonds REQ: 20,000
- Pay: $10 (1,000 diamonds)

Have them apply here: [Apply Now](https://infinitumlive.com/creator-pre-check/)

title: Increase Creator Earnings & Recharge Incentives with Infinitum!
description:
This initiative can significantly benefit the creators in by boosting recharge rates and giving creators a strong incentive to reactivate Gifters and extend your Go-LIVE duration.

We’ve always known that web recharge offers discounted Coins, but now, for the first time, Infinitum LIVE Creator Network members can receive additional compensation directly from the referrals to tiktok.com/coin that your creators generate.

**How Creator Networks Can Maximize This Opportunity:**

✅ Encourage creators to leverage the campaign – They can increase their earnings while their supporters enjoy exclusive discounts.
✅ Utilize top-performing creators to educate – Posting educational content about web recharge can boost commissions and create long-term recharge habits for Gifters, strengthening their support for creators.

**Suggested Creator Script:**

🔹 From now until March 9, you can recharge at tiktok.com/coin and get 25% off Coins + 1-5% cashback!
🔹 Use my referral code to support my streams or if this was helpful!
🔹 Add tiktok.com/coin as a shortcut on your phone, recharge from there, and receive a 10% cashback coupon for future recharges!

📌 **How to add the shortcut:**
1️⃣ Go to tiktok.com/coin in your web browser.
2️⃣ Click the share icon (on iOS) or menu icon (on Android).
3️⃣ Select “Add to Home Screen” and save it.
4️⃣ Use the new shortcut for easy recharges and cashback!

**Video Content Ideas for Creators:**

🎥 Green Screen – Show step-by-step instructions on how to recharge.
👥 Collab with affiliates & brand spokespeople – Expand reach and engagement.
📲 Use Promote Coupons – Boost visibility on TikTok.
📌 Post across multiple platforms – Use pinned comments for more visibility.
💡 Authenticity wins! – Engage naturally rather than sounding scripted.

Let’s maximize earnings and keep our creators thriving! 🚀💎

title: [New] Team Match Mode Coming Soon
description:
Go 1v2 or 1v3 with other creators using *team match!

Hi everyone! We have exciting new team match combinations—1v2 and 1v3—currently being tested on TikTok LIVE. 90% of creators will have access starting today (2.13) and we anticipate all creators to have access before the end of February.

For more information on accessing the new team match combinations and a preview of the UI, check out the attached one-pager.

Feel free to share any questions or feedback you may have or receive on this new match mode! We're eager to continue optimizing and improving the match experience on TikTok LIVE.

**FAQ:**

**Q:** I do not have access to new team match modes. When will I receive access?

**A:** We anticipate you will receive access in the next 2 weeks, before the end of February!

**Q:** Do 1v2 or 1v3 wins count towards a match win streak?

**A:** Currently, team match wins do not count towards a win streak. However, we are working on updating this capability in the future.
